## Joins

```{r}
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```


```{r}
flights <- nycflights13::flights 

flights <- flights%>% 
  left_join(
    y = airlines, 
    by = join_by("carrier" == "carrier")
    )

flights %>% 
  select(carrier, name, everything()) %>% 
  head(3)
```

```{r}
names(flights)
```

```{r}
names(planes)
```

```{r}
nmf <- names(flights)
nmf[nmf %in% names(planes)]
```

```{r}
setdiff(names(flights), names(planes))
```

```{r}
setdiff(names(planes), names(flights))
```

```{r}
intersect(names(planes), names(flights))
```
